definition: laser (loanword)/Taiwanese term for 激光[ji1 guang1]

sentences.english: Optical resolution is expressed as a ratio of the distance to the resolution spot divided by the diameter of the spot.
sentences.chinese: 光分辨率是以距离到镭射点直径的比例关系来描述的。

sentences.english: Black-and-white laser printers are mainly used to print the variable data.
sentences.chinese: 黑白镭射印刷主要应用于可变资料印刷。

sentences.english: Graff laser-marks his most expensive stones.
sentences.chinese: 格拉夫在他最昂贵的珠宝上都做了镭射标记。

sentences.english: The laser field operation has become now a very fashionable military sports movement.
sentences.chinese: 镭射野战已成为当今一项非常时尚的军事体育运动。

sentences.english: Stencil manufacturing techniques include chemical etching laser cutting and electroforming.
sentences.chinese: 钢网制作技术包括化学腐蚀，镭射切割和电铸。

sentences.english: Commonly with vehicles or buildings, the lase will seem to 'snap to' the object.
sentences.chinese: 通常镭射载具或建筑，标记好像“贴齐”在目标上。

sentences.english: This new laser printer is compatible with all the leading software.
sentences.chinese: 这台镭射打印机和所有的领先软件都兼容。

sentences.english: In a laser beam, all the waves have the same wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 镭射光中，所有光波的波长都一样。

sentences.english: Laser lamp holder is fixed in the stress holder, and connected the junction with the wire.
sentences.chinese: 镭射灯头插入受力支架内固定，并将接头与电线连接。

sentences.english: Today, I'm going to talk about light, and in particular about laser beams.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我要谈一谈光，特别是镭射光。

sentences.english: New structures and material systems including blue-green lasers and cascade lasers.
sentences.chinese: 新型结构与材料系统，包括蓝绿光镭射与串叠镭射。

sentences.english: New structures and material systems including blue-green lasers and cascade lasers.
sentences.chinese: 新型结构与材料系统，包括蓝绿光镭射与串叠镭射。
